<meta name="description" content="It’s BBQin’ time, so we put together some delicious recipes for all you grillheads out there curated by chef Whoogy's. Whether you’re cooking with a beer or cooking with beer, you’ll definitely need an IPA in hand so let’s start there." />

yoast_head_json.description: It’s BBQin’ time, so we put together some delicious recipes for all you grillheads out there curated by chef Whoogy's. Whether you’re cooking with a beer or cooking with beer, you’ll definitely need an IPA in hand so let’s start there.

@graph.description: It’s BBQin’ time, so we put together some delicious recipes for all you grillheads out there curated by chef Whoogy's. Whether you’re cooking with a beer or cooking with beer, you’ll definitely need an IPA in hand so let’s start there.
